meanings.definition: A person's body type or build.
meanings.sent1: Her somatotype is slender and tall.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study somatotypes to understand different body shapes.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, his somatotype as a sumo wrestler was quite convincing.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, her somatotype was like a delicate mannequin.
meanings.sent5: The somatotype of the athlete was that of a lean and agile runner.

meanings.definition: The classification of human body types according to a system developed by William H. Sheldon.
meanings.sent1: The gym instructor explained the different somatotypes to the class.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use somatotypes to categorize individuals based on body characteristics.
meanings.sent3: In the movie, the aliens had a somatotype that resembled giant insects.
meanings.sent4: The somatotype system by Sheldon helped in understanding body diversity.
meanings.sent5: The somatotype theory by Sheldon revolutionized the study of human physique.
